item.description: Mixicles: Simple Private Decentralized Finance Ari Juels https://twitter.com/kanzure/status/1230666545803563008 https://chain.link/mixicles.pdf Introduction This work was done in my capacity as technical advisor to Chainlink, and not my Cornell or IC3 affiliation. Mixicle is a combination of the words mixers and oracles. You will see why in a moment. DeFi and privacy As of a couple of weeks ago, DeFi passed the $1 billion mark which is to say there’s over $1 billion of cryptocurrency in DeFi smart contracts today.
